p: Pain may be acute or chronic depending on the duration of inflammatory response in the body [ 38, 39]. Inflammatory mechanisms assist in eliminating pathogens or stimulating wound healing in order to protect and restore cells and tissues into normal physiological functions [ 4]. Inflammatory responses, resulting in excessive release of inflammatory mediators and cytokines, can lead to tissue damage, chronic disease, and pain [ 9, 10]. Although medication can be effective for pain relief from inflammation, side effects from medication (i.e., steroid, NSAIDs, opioids, acetaminophen, etc) are significant. Herbal medicine is considered and utilized as a natural alternative for treatment of pain relief with potential to avoid some side-effects [ 40].
